definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: Combine four cubes and 8 oz. of Diet Coke.
sentences.chinese: 混合四個冰塊和220ml健怡可樂。

sentences.english: You can use fun ice-cube shapes for drinks, too.
sentences.chinese: 同時，你也可以用些有趣的冰塊狀給飲料添加吸引力。

sentences.english: Simply pour ingredients, add ice, stir, and enjoy!
sentences.chinese: 簡單的混合原料，加冰塊，攪合，享用。

sentences.english: Food grade polished aluminium cubes to be frozen and used in drinks as ice cubes.
sentences.chinese: 用食用色素處理過的凍鋁塊放到飲料裏當冰塊。

sentences.english: Chuck Norris can light a fire by rubbing two ice-cubes together.
sentences.chinese: 羅禮士可以摩擦兩塊冰塊生火。

sentences.english: The river is blocked up with ice.
Shake with ice and strain over ice. Serve with a straw.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料，濾入冰塊，置入吸管。

sentences.english: Pour ingredients into a highball blass over ice. Stir, garnish and serve.
sentences.chinese: 將所有原料入盛有冰塊的海波杯，攪合，裝飾。

sentences.english: This aquarium tank from the ice structure, ornamental fish frozen in the inside.
sentences.chinese: 這種水族缸由冰塊構成，觀賞魚被冷凍在了裏面。

sentences.english: Ahsoka parried left and right while pushing some chunks back to him.
sentences.chinese: 阿索卡左躲右閃，同時把一些大冰塊回推給他。

sentences.english: Yes, plesae. A martini on the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 好，來一杯加冰塊的馬丁尼。

sentences.english: Shake recipe with ice, strain over ice and top with Champagne.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料，濾入冰塊，注入適量香檳。

sentences.english: Add enough ice cubes and pour in cachaca.
sentences.chinese: 加入足夠冰塊，然後倒入朗姆酒。

sentences.english: Shake with ice and pour into a glass. Fill up with Champagne.
sentences.chinese: 加冰塊搖合原料，濾入冰過的玻璃杯，注滿香檳。

sentences.english: Shake with ice and strain over ice. Serve with a straw and swizzle-stick.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料，濾入冰塊，置入吸管。

sentences.english: Add one dash of BOLS Bitter Orange. Shake with ice and strain.
sentences.chinese: 加少量波士橘子苦酒，加冰塊搖合，濾入玻璃杯。

definition: to work extra hours/to do overtime
